ja474:6.2: Khaṇaṃ muhuttañca mante na passaṃ → khaṇaṃ muhuttaṃ na maṃ tosayanti (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja474:7.3: Sayaṃ harī → athāharī (bj) | athāhari (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja474:8.1: pure hi → pura'ssa (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | purepi (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja474:9.4: atthaṃ → mā taṃ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1ed), vijaheyya manto → vijaheyyu mantā (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja474:14.6: punappadāhi → punappasīda (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed) | puna sampadāhi (sya1ed, sya2ed)
ja474:15.2: Tuvampi dhammena → tvampi dhammeneva (mr), pariggahesi → paṭiggahesi (bj, pts-vp-pli1ed)
ja474:16.3: Kiñcāpi laddhā jīvituṃ appapañño → kicchā laddhā jīvikaṃ appapañño (bj) | kicchā laddhaṃ jīvitaṃ appapañño (sya1ed, sya2ed) | kicchāpi laddhā jīvikaṃ appañña (pts-vp-pli1ed)
